author: sroychow
body:
#### PR description:
Migrate two modules - L1TriggerResultsConverter and  LHCInfoProducer, to access data from EventSetup with ESConsumes.
No changes are expected due to this.
#### PR validation:
Code compiles and wf 136.8523 runs.

#### if this PR is a backport please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR:
Not needed.
title: NanoAOD:migrate modules to ESConsumes
